short_summary: Provision of Life Safety Services. This includes testing, repair, and replacement of Life Safety Systems.
description: The purpose of the Life Safety Testing, System Repairs and Replacement Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) is for life safety services, installations, alterations, testing and repair work, as and when required, at facilities located throughout the Yukon Region. An example of a required service is the repair of the fire alarm and detection systems. It is PWGSC's intention to authorize up to one (1) Standing Offers, each for a period of two (2) years with two (2) irrevocable options to extend the term of the Standing Offer for two (2) additional consecutive twelve (12) months periods. The total dollar value of all Standing Offers is estimated to be $1,575,000.00 (GST or HST included) for two years.
